featured.text: Some regions prepare horses made of cucumbers and cows made of eggplants, hoping that the spirits will come back to Earth quickly, on a horse, and leave slowly, riding the cow.

definition.zh_def: 一種紫色或黑色的蔬菜，通常用於烹飪，學名為茄子。
definition.en_def: A purple or black vegetable commonly used in cooking, scientifically known as Solanum melongena.
definition.example: I made a delicious eggplant parmesan for dinner.
